result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:15 PM Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche appeared by ZOOM.  Attorney Richard S Zoellner in court for Daniel Robert Deroche.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Zoellner heard - has not had time to review discovery with Deft yet.
Requests another status.
DA heard - will be filing new charges today.
Court schedules with parties.
If the hearing will be a plea, the Deft must appear in person.
2:20 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Letter from Atty Zoellner requesting Zoom for Deft

3:01 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche appeared by ZOOM.  Attorney Richard S Zoellner in court for Daniel Robert Deroche. 
Copy of Info - filed 7-5-22.
Atty Zoellner - received/reviewed, waives reading, enters n/g pleas.
Court schedules STC w/parties.
3:03 pm
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 02:10 pm.

3:39 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche appeared by zoom.  Attorney Richard S Zoellner in court for Daniel Robert Deroche. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Attorney Zoellner heard on request for client to appear via zoom
DA has no objection
Court allows deft. to appear via zoom for arraignment
3:47PM
Arraignment scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Instructions on how to appear remotely

9:12 AM Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche appeared by ZOOM means.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Richard S Zoellner in court for Daniel Robert Deroche. 
Court calls case.
Court informs deft of proper procedures for appearing by ZOOM.
Deft understands.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Zoellner heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal readings.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
9:14 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Approved-Request for deft to appear via zoom
Dean appt Atty: Zoellner- Repayment at $250/mo Commencing June 1, 2022.

records.addlTxt:
09:41 AM Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche in court.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case.
Deft heard - does not qualify for PD representation.
Deft provides dean paperwork to the court.
Deft sworn in.
Court reviews form with deft.
Deft to pay $250 per month towards dean fees, starting June 1, 2022.
Court appoints Atty Zoellner to the case.
DA provides copy of complaint to Atty Zoellner.
Court schedules.
9:45 AM
  Status conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:32 AM Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche in court with attorney Jon G Spansail.  Defendant Daniel Robert Deroche in custody.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daniel Robert Deroche appeared by video means with Attorney.
Atty Spansail is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Spansail heard - deft understands charges and penalties.
DA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Spansail heard on bond.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $1,500 cash bail w/conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with co-defts, C.B. or J.S. 
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
11:37 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
